DOC.brief_summary: Menopausal syndromes include somatic symptom , psychosomatic symptom , sexual dysfunction even urinary symptom . Hormone therapy ( HT ) widely use control menopausal symptom . Common HT menopausal syndrome intact uterus include tibolone , estradiol valerate ( E2V ) 1mg & medroxyprogesterone acetate ( MPA ) 2.5 mg , conjugate equine estrogens & MPA . However , literature mention therapeutic effect tibolone , lack comparison research therapeutic effect somatic symptom , psychosomatic symptom , sexual dysfunction even urinary symptom . The knowledge therapeutic effect important choose suitable medication . Therefore , aim study assess therapeutic effect somatic symptom , psychosomatic symptom , sexual dysfunction even urinary symptom tibolone E2V/MPA .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Hormone Therapy Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms , Sexual Function Psychosomatic Disorder
DOC.criteria: All female patient intact uterus seek medical treatment menopausal syndrome patient gynecologic breast cancer
